Class AbstractDwcjPanel

java.lang.Object
org.dwcj.controls.AbstractDwcControl
org.dwcj.panels.AbstractDwcjPanel
All Implemented Interfaces:
IControl, IStyleable
Direct Known Subclasses:
AppPanel, Div
public abstract class AbstractDwcjPanel extends AbstractDwcControl implements IStyleable
the base class for all panel implementations
